changelog.release_notes: Fixed hand border color always being set to black.

Patch Notes 2.5: 

* Various minor code tweaks 

* Added the option to display the current date on the top of the watchface, and a digital clock display on the bottom of the watchface. The date and digital clock displays can be toggled to appear for 3.5 seconds by shaking the watch, or to always be on or off. Thanks to Patricio R for the suggestion! 

* Added the option to have the watch vibrate upon losing its Bluetooth connection. Thanks to Dylan B requesting this feature!

Patch Notes 2.4:
* Various minor code tweaks
* Added the option to display the current date on the top of the watchface, and a digital clock display on the bottom of the watchface. The date and digital clock displays can be toggled to appear for 3.5 seconds by shaking the watch, or to always be on or off. Thanks to Patricio R for the suggestion!
* Added the option to have the watch vibrate upon losing its Bluetooth connection. Thanks to Dylan B requesting this feature!

Thanks to Jeff T. for requesting the following features:

Added an hourly notification vibration: Turn "Hourly Vibration" on in the Settings menu and choose a starting and ending time for a small buzz on the top of each hour within your chosen timeframe.

Added a 24h display option: Choose "24 Hour" under "Digit Format" in the Settings menu to display the hour digits in a 24-hour format rather than the standard 12-hour (only the digits change, the shape and spacing of the clock remain the same).
Fixed Blue for real this time (hopefully).
Changed some color options so they show up better on the Pebble Time display.

Added color support for Pebble Time!
Mix and match and customize the colors of Macro Clock from the configuration page!

data.description:
Customizable, minimal watchface featuring a roaming zoomed-in clock face effect.

Features:
* Customizable background, number, dot, and hand colors
* 12 hour or 24 hour time format
* Optional hourly vibration (with adjustable start and end times)
* Optional vibration upon Bluetooth disconnect (Thanks to Dylan B for the suggestion)
* Optional date and digital clock displays that can be configured to be always on, always off, or to display temporarily upon shaking the watch (thanks to Patricio R for the suggestion)

Feel free to email me comments, complaints, or requests at shamhu@gmail.com
